info.title: Consolidation FS Item Hierarchy - Read
info.description: A consolidation financial statement item hierarchy is a structure of financial statement items in consolidation. For example, you can have a one hierarchy for the balance sheet and another for the income statement.

x-sap-shortText: Read consolidation financial statement item hierarchies in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Master Data for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0336)
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
